title: Compact sans serif in Sasquatch Festival Line-up Video
content:
I searched through all the usual suspects, and I am obviously missing something here. The full video can be viewed on [Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818190103/http:/vimeo.com/groups/178462/videos/36152925).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818190103im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sasquatch-Festival_line-up_6527.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed
